Operation 'getCountries' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Current description only mentions authorization status, which is insufficient. Added clarity about what the operation returns (CountrySummary array), what inputs are expected (marketId and filters), the lack of authentication requirement, and the use case (lightweight overview). This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation versus getCountry.

data.current_summary: Retrieves summary country information for the provided marketId and filters
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve country summaries by market and filters
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a list of country summaries filtered by the specified marketId and optional filter criteria. No authentication required. Returns an array of CountrySummary objects containing country identifiers and basic information. Use this operation to get a lightweight overview of countries available in a specific market.
data.reasoning: Current description only mentions authorization status, which is insufficient. Added clarity about what the operation returns (CountrySummary array), what inputs are expected (marketId and filters), the lack of authentication requirement, and the use case (lightweight overview). This helps AI agents understand when to use this operation versus getCountry.

message: Operation 'getCountry' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. Current description lacks substantive information beyond authorization status. Enhanced to explain the countryKey parameter requirement, what data is returned (Country object with state summaries), the lack of authentication, and the use case distinction from getCountries. This enables AI agents to differentiate between summary and detailed country retrieval operations.

data.current_summary: Retrieves country and summary state information for provided countryKey
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve detailed country and state information

No authentication required. Returns a Country object with state summaries. Use this operation when you need comprehensive country data including administrative divisions.
